name: They Sent Us To Infinity
description:
A crew composed of the brightest minds in the galaxy are sent on a mission to finally see the Edge of the universe. You, the communication officer aboard the Vespira, are a trusted confidant for the whole crew. When they have trouble they come to you. The mission is three days away from arrival to the Edge. Everyone is scrambling to prepare and tension arises. Now you have a choice: do you mend the problems between your crew or do you stir the pot ?

Designers:

Tori Smith (@worldwideblond) - Narrative Design and Writing, Project Management
Camron Gonzalez (@CGonza) - Narrative Design and Writing, Additional Programming
JD Calvelli (@jdcalvelli) - Lead Programmer, Technical Narrative Design
Chenyan Yu - Lead Artist, UI Designer

This prototype was built in three weeks using the Unity Engine, Fungus, Ink, and a lot of coffee.
